# Workflows Index {.unnumbered}

End-to-end Jupyter Notebook templates for common data science tasks. Each example uses a small, built-in dataset.

- [Classification with Tabular Data](classification_tabular) - Training a random forest classifier with `scikit-learn` preprocessing and grid search on the Palmer penguins dataset.
- [Regression with Tabular Data](regression_tabular) - Training different regression models with `scikit-learn` preprocessing and grid search on the tips dataset.
- [Forecasting on Univariate Time Series](forecasting_multi_univariate) - Training different forecasting models with `darts` package on sea ice dataset.
